short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check in with your current feelings, and send details to your teacher

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to help students become more mindful of their emotional state, and increase communication about their well being with school personnel to ensure holistic, supported learning.
